column2: Imbwa shibili,imo ileenda imo naiminina kwilinga.
column3: boi, imo imbwa ili iyabuta elo imo ili iyafita.
column4: ee boi, imbwa iyabuta naimona icintu cimo icho ilekonka.
column5: boi nomba ninshi imbwa iyafita ishalile kwilinga?
column6: nalimo ico ishalile kwilinga nicho nabaikakila.

column2: umulumendo ali mu chibansa aleyangala.
column3: boi,bushe bwangalo nshi ubu umulumendo uyu aleyangala?
column4: Mune,ninshi emukutila tawaleyangalako aya amangalo kubwaice?
column5: naleyangala,nomba abaice banomba balangala ifyapusanako.
column6: awe mune,ubwangalo ubu bwangalo bwakufulamuka

column2: Abaice babili,umulumendo nomukashasana,bali pa chela baleyangala.
column3: boi,akamukashana kalemoneka akafulwa kaikala nakeka,bushe kuti chaba ati akalumendo kacilabala akakashana?
column4: kuti chaba nifyo,walishiba abalumendo balitemwa ulubuli.
column5: awe telubuli boi,mwati tabalifye muchitemwiko aba?
column6: awe boi naiwe, icitemwiko cabakulu,lubulifye abalumendo bakwatisha.

column2: Imbwa shibili shili pamusebo,imo nabaikaka itambo mumukoshi imo tabaikakile.
column3: boi,bushe imbwa ilya tabakakile finshi ilecita kunuma kwainankwe?
column4: awe kwena taumfwa, ifwile ilelya utushishi utulecilinganya imbwa inankwe.
column5: iye tata lesa, ine nacilamona ati ilefwaya ukusuma imbwa inankwe.
column6: awe boi, imbwa shilatolana utushishi pamibili shashiko.

column2: shitata naikala palukungu apo apalemoneka kwati ni pa mwinshi wakwingila mwituka.
column3: Bushe cinshi cingalenga ukuti shitata ekale panshi umusango uyu?
column4: chilemoneka kwati uyu shitata nanaka nangu nangula kuti caba mukutila nakolwa.
column5: Cine epo bekele palemoneka kwati nipetuka,bushe kuti caba ati nibalya abalomba munshila nomba baletusha?
column6: boi,kuti caba nifyofine, nawishiba icaalo inonshita calishupa.

column2: umulumendo umwaice naikata kumutwe, kunuma yakwe kuli na ibumba lyabantu.
column3: Nomba boi aka akamwaice kekete kumutwe kwati pali efyo kamwene ifikapapwishe.
column4: ee boi,incende kaliko ili kwati nikulya batwala abaice mukwangala.
column5: awe icho kamwene nacikapapusha saana,kuti kayasama kukanwa umusango uyu.
column6: Ala bwafya,ifisangwa kunchende shapala ifi fyalifulisha boi.

column2: Imbwa shibili shileingila paka panga shilebutuka.
column3: boi imbwa ishi shilemoneka ishikali,nashifumya nendimi panse kwati shamona akakulya akanona.
column4: shifwele shileyangalafye, Imbwa shalitemwa ukubutauka, kuti wasanga limbi pali abashipepeke.
column5: boi ishi nimbwa shakweba ati ngawashimonafye ufwile watampako nolubilo, utunwa natukulisha.
column6: ubwafya walifulisha umwenso, imbwa shalitemwa ukwangala nabantu,ngawabutuka ninshi wailetelelafye.

column2: Imbwa iyafita ileyangala nomupila palubansa apo apali na mabula yauma.
column3: iwe boi, ine naishiba ukweba ati imbwa shipepekafye abantu, napapa saana ukumona imbwa ileyangala nomupila.
column4: ee boi kwaliba abanensu abasambilisha imbwa shabo ukucita ifilifyonse basheba.
column5: Amabula yauma nayafulisha,ninshi nikumpanga baitwele imbwa ine iyi?
column6: awe boi, nimwilingafye umu kwaliba abakwata imansa ishikulu elo babyalikapo nefimuti.

column2: Umulumendo napapa umukashana munuma elyo kunuma kuleisa umwaume nomwanakashi nabekatana amaboko.
column3: ifyo abantu aba basendene kwati bonse bali muchitemwiko,na icende ilemoneka kwati niku mpili ukwatalalila.
column4: ee mune,icende shapala ifi kuya abatemwikwa abalefwaya ukutushako kuficitika mucaalo.
column5: ifucitwa fyamucaalo ifyapala shani, wilatontokanya saana limbi belefye ati bendeko.
column6: ificitwa fyamucaalo fingi,kuti limbi bali ikatililwa nama cito yabo umulungu onse, apa ninshita yabo iyakumonanako.

column2: Imbwa iyabalala ilepita mumenshi.
column3: Bushe amenshi imbwa ine iyi ilepitamo,menshi yamfula nangu palu kumbi uko yalefuma?
column4: Amenshi yalemoneka kwati nimulamba,pantu neyesulisha elo futi tayali pamopene.
column5: imbwa shine ishi shilatinya,nayasamuna nakukanwa kwati papita umwaka epoyalilepo icakulya.
column6: boi,Imbwa iyi ifwile yaciya mukuseya elo imfula yaisanga kulyakwine, cipalile kwati elo ilebwekelamo kun'ganda.

column2: Akamwana nakekala mu ng'anda, nakasekelela nakabika na lamya kumatwi.
column3: Akamwana kalemoneka kwati abo kalelanda nabena pali lamya nabakeba ifikomfwishe bwino saana.
column4: kumwenafye mukusekelela, kamoneka bwino sana akamwana kampela necilaka cakukwatapo umo naine.
column5: Abana lipalo saana ukufuma kuli lesa,emulandu umwana alingile ukumucitila fyonse ifyo alefwaya.
column6: Abana aba,kuti wasanga ati tapali nebo alelanda nabena alefipangafye umwine fyamusekesha nokumusekesha.

column2: Imbwa iyabutulukila ili pa chani ilebutuka.
column3: iyi imbuto yambwa ilemoneka kwati yalitemwa ukwangala nabantu.
column4: efyo ilelanga pamenso,kwati nabaiposela cimo mumulu eco ilefwaya ukwanka.
column5: incende iliko imbwa ilemoneka kwati nikulya batwala abaice mukwangala.
column6: nakuba cishinka,ifwile ili nomwine uwaciisenda ukuya mukwangala

column2: umulumendo umwaice alikuncende ukwangalila abaice alebutuka.
column3: Bushe ukubutuka alebutuka umwaice uyu kubutuka kwamwenso nangu aleyangalafye?
column4: Alebutukafye,walishiba chaliba icikankala ukuilolekesha pafyo umubili obe ulemoneka.
column5: ine naletontonkanya ati abakalamba ebacitafye ifi filecita umwaice uyu.
column6: awe boi, ifintu fimo tafyakwata imyaka shakuficitilapo,umuntu uulionse afwilefye alolekesha pabumi bwakwe.

column2: Utukashana tutatu tuleyangala palubansa, natufwala notuputula twakusambilamo.
column3: cipalile kwati akakashana kumpela yakukulyo nakacita ifyawama saana,pantu aka pakati kaseka saana.
column4: Walishibafye kubwaice ifyo kwaba,nomba uyu kumpela ya kukuso alemoneka kwati teshibe ifilecitika.
column5: boi pa mbushi tapabula iyabalala, kafwile takasalapukafye ngabanankwe.
column6: chishinka icho boi, nako akalipakati nakasalapukisha,ukuseka kaikata napalufumo.

column2: icimbayambaya cileenda,chanyanta pali mulamba elo asabuka.
column3: ukukwine ichimbayambaya cilepitila kulemoneka kwati nikumpanga,ifimuti nafifulisha mumbali yamusebo.
column4: ee boi ni mu mpanga,kumwenafye nakumusebo, tauli uwawama bwino bwino echo yacipitila namuli mulamba.
column5: naumfwila uluse umwine wacimbayambaya,pakuti afike ninshi calamba kwati katwishi, umusebo ulinabamilamba.
column6: wilasakama,pakuti apitile kunshila ya ifi ninshi naishiba epo ashintilile,aleyapelafye abakumusamfisha.

column2: Abaume babili bali pakati kebumba lyabantu,umo ali pamulu aletolokela umunankwe pamutwe. balelwa ulubili lwankonya nokudonsana.
column3: Bushe ulilwine ulubili lwamakofi nokuponyanya lwacishinka nangu bacitafye mukusekeshe abantu baletamba?
column4: kwena ulubuli ulu lwalibako ulwashupa ukwishiba ifilecitika, pantu umuntu teti atolokele umunankwe filya pamutwe ngacakuti balesekeshafye abantu.
column5: awe kwena cishinka, pantu ukutombekela umunobe pamutwe cimo nokumwipaya,fwebashakosa kanshi kulatambakofye.
column6: wansekesha saana, abantu aba abalwa imbuli sha ifi bafwile balabakansha,bafwile balibelela nokubelela.

column2: umulumendo aleyangala na Honda mumulu, muchibansa muli na ibumba lyabantu abaletamba uyu mulumendo.
column3: Abantu bonse mwibumba baletota, cilemoneka kwati nabasekalamo sana pafyo uyu muntu alepilibausha icela cakwe.
column4: Boi amangalo ya ifi yalaleta abantu abengi chapamo, balomfwa bwino ukutamba umuntu alecita ifintu ifyo abengi teti bacite.
column5: Nomba nangu bengomfwa bwino,umunabo ngaicena akacula eka nabalupwa bakwe.
column6: boi umuntu pakucita ifi ninshi pali cimo, ubu ubwangalo bukulu saana,limbi balapela indalama ishingi saana kuli uyo uwacimfya.

column2: umulumendo aleyensha chi honda ichikulu mumpili nembwa yakwe ilemupepeka panuma.
column3: kumpanga ukukwine kwaliba ifimuti ifyafunda,kuti kwakumfwisha nomwenso ukuyako weka.
column4: awe boi aba bantu balibelela,bafwile bapitamo lyonse,balishiba ifisangwamo nefishisangwamo.
column5: kunuma ndemonako ifishimbi fyamalaiti, limbi ni balya abawamya amalaiti ngayapoka.
column6: awe boi, alemoneka kwati mulimi,limbi acilaya kumo nomba inshila yapita mumomwine nomwapita amalaiti.

column2: abantu babili,bawishi no mwana bali mufyani baleyensha akambayambaya akanono.
column3: boi cilemoneka kwati bawishi balefunda akamwana ifyakwensha icimbayambaya.
column4: ee boi, balefunda umwana ifyakwensha icimbayambaya pakuti nangu tabalipo ashala aleyansha eka.
column5: abana bainonshita baleishiba bwangu utuntu,ifwe kale twaleteyafye icidunu nefiyenga.
column6: boi inshita ilesela,taumwenefye ifyo akamwana kasansamwike, nakomfwa bwino saana nangula kali nomwenso.

column2: akamulumendo kalepanga tu baluni ukubomfya ifulo lye sopo,elo katuputila mumulu.
column3: Bushe ututwine utuma bola umulumendo alepanga,kulatulekafye nangu kulatuposha mumulu?
column4: kuli iminwe shimbi kumbali ishileposha tu baluni ngatuputila mumwela.
column5: bulemoneka ukuwama saana ubwangalo ubu,bushe walibumwenepo munshita shesu?
column6: ee boi eko bwali,nomba ifwe twalebomfyafye iminwe nesopo pa ng'anda ngapali abalewasha.

column2: umuntu  ali pamulu walupili alelolesha panshi,kumbali yakwe kuli namabwe eyo bapampa busaka busaka.
column3: uyu muntu alemoneka kwati kale acitampa ukukwela ulupili nomba nanaka.     .
column4: impili shilanasha ukukweleka mune,aleumfwafye bwino ukutambila icaalo pamulu walupili.
column5: umulu ulemonekela apepi palya afikile,alemona kwati nafika muli lesa.
column6: wansekesha saana, ulupili lulomfwishafye bwino ngawafika pamulu,kulaba nokulaba ukunaka wacinaka pakukwela.

column2: Ibumba lyabantu nalilongana,pali ili ibumba pali  utwaice tubili,kambi nakafwala icisote chakashika ichafikumo elo kambi kafwele icisote icfimbile umutwe onse
column3: abantu bene nabafulisha mwibumba ili mwati kuti waishiba nefilicitika
column4: boi ilingi line amabumba yaifi yalongana ngayaleya mukutamba fimo, ifyapala umupila nangu ulubuli.
column5: nomba naumona akalumendo muchisote chakashika ifyo kalelolesha umunankwe,kwati ekaleya mukulwa ulubuli lwine ulelandapo.
column6: awe boi,ukulolesha kulya kwakuposako amano,akamunankwe kafwile kalelandapo fimo ifyo alekutikisha

column2: umulumendo aleshelemuka pa bunga bwa mfula pamulu waciyanda icaonaika.
column3: iciyanda cilemoneka kwati chaonaike kumulandu wambunga bwamfula ubwaponene nganshi.
column4: ee boi ubunga bwa mfula bulafina saana ngabwapona ubwingi.
column5: boi kulemoneka kwati kwalitalala saana ukukwine pantu umulemendo ifyakufwala afwele filemoneka ukutikama saana.
column6: ee boi kwalitalala saana,kanshi ngati apone kuti alila saana,walishibafye ifilonda fyamumpepo.

column2: abalumendo bane,balelwila umupila,pambali napeminina nabalolekesha ukuti ubu ubwangalo bwateyeka bwino.
column3: nimbona nabalekopa kumbali yacibansa, nabale tembakofye.ninshi ubu bwangalo busuma saana?
column4: ee boi,ubwangalo bwaliwama saana nangula bumoneka kwati lubuli.
column5: amangalo yamo yalatinya ukwangalako,yafwaika waya naulya impoto yabwali weka.
column6: walitemwafye nokulya boi,tapaba ichashupa ngawacisambilila, filemoneka ukukosa ilelo tafyakosa.

column2: umwaice aleyangala kumuputule,aletolokela pa busanshi ubunono ukufuma pamulu wa busanshi ubukalamba.
column3: iwe boi,nomba takaicene akamwaice aka, palemoneka apatali saana epo kaletombokela.
column4: ala bwafya. abaice tabomfwa,kena palya pene kalepamona apepi.
column5: namona ati abaice bafwaika cilanshita baliko nomukulu uulebamona,kuwasangafye umuntu naicena chakupesha namano.
column6: naumona kena takafiposeleko namano,kaleseka nokuseka, kalefwayafye ifili mumano ficitike.

column2: ibumba lyabantu, pali ili ibumba pali umulumendo uwimishe ichinga mumulu.
column3: bushe boi cinshi cingalenga ati umulumendo emye ichinga umusango uyu mumulu?
column4: alemoneka kwati apakupita nenchinga yakwe tapali,abantu nabafulisha abali pa nchende ilya.
column5: umulumendo nankwe kuti akupapusha,ninshi teti abomfesheko inshila imbi nga pamushupa ukupita?
column6: wansekesha saana,limbi epali apepi ukulingana neko aleya umwine.

column2: umwana alelilila ifyakulya efyo  nabatantike mwi tuka.
column3: fifwile filemoneka bwino saana ifyakulya ifyofine pantu umwana napunda saana.
column4: teti wishibe abana balilila nefyo bashishibe,chikulufye echamwisa mumano.
column5: ee cishinka icho boi pantu kusanga ati ngabamushitila talyenokulya,alaciposafye.
column6: awe kwena nayasama umwana, wilalaba indalama ngawasenda abana bobe mu kushunguluka mu kalale,bakayakusebanya.

column2: abantu batatu,umulumendo umo nabakashana babili nabasekelela.
column3: awe kwena nabasekelela, bushe boi kubaba niba munyina nangu umwanakashi umo mutemwikwa ku mwaume?
column4: ine nacilamona kwati pali abakashi nabalume elo no mwana wabo kumpela kukulyo.
column5: ee ifyo walanda fyapalako,pantu uyo mukashana kukulyo alemoneka umwaice saana.
column6: ee boi bafwile balile mukushungulakako,walishiba inonshita abantu balitemwa ukuya mukusangalala.

column2: imbwa shibili ishikulu ishafita shilipacani shilecena
column3: boi imbwa ishi shilemoneka ishakakata,ngawashisanga ubushiku kwamba nokupepa pantu kukulya umubishi.
column4: wansekesha saana,naumona ifyo shishangalele kubashakosa ukumona shabapepeka kubafwapo nakafwa kanono.
column5: kulemoneka nikumpanga saana ukukwine shili kuti chaba ati umwine acishisenda mukushisambilishapo fimo?
column6: kuti chaba nifyofine boi,kwaliba abasenda imbwa kwati bana babo, teti wishibe kaili iwe walipata imbwa.

column2: Imbwa iyabuta ili pa menshi nakamuti kukanwa.
column3: boi ine nshaishibe ati imbwa yalishiba ukowa,nalemona kwati imbwa ngayaponena pamenshi ninshi ekufwa ekufwa.
column4: boi imbwa chaba fye nefyo waisenda,kwaliba abafunda imbwa shabo ifintu ifyakupapa saana.
column5: awe kanshi ilyashi lya mbwa lyalikosa,nomba akamuti kukanwa kalecitako finshi?
column6: limbi baciiposela pamumana elo bayeba ukuyakasenda,walishiba tayakwata ukwakwikatila kumbi kamofye kukanwa.

column2: Ibumba lyabantu lilebutuka mumusebo,umumwine mumusebo muli abafyashi abemishe umwana wabo umwaume.
column3: Nomba boi akamwana abafyashi bemishe nakabifya pamenso kwati kalelila.
column4: kaili niku chintubwingi,walishiba abana balalila saana ngabali kubantu ebo tababelesha ukusangwa nabo
column5: elo ibumba lyabantu balebutuka balemoneka kwati bafumine kumokwine.
column6: bafwile balipingana ukuya sunkanyako imibili shabo boi.

column2: umulumendo aleowa muci plastiki ico icakupompa icikalamba, eco anshike pa lunkoto.
column3: umulumendo alemoneka kwati nasangalala saana,elyo nimbona nomumana uukulu kunuma yakwe.
column4: ee boi,chipalile kwati talaishiba ukowa pamenshi ayengi ecilengele ati aleyangashafye amenshi
column5: efyo abifishepo pamenso kwati kwatwishi efyo amona,icine cine taishiba ukowa pamenshi ayengi.
column6: ee boi pamenshi pafwaika umuntu uukoseleko uushikwete nomwenso.

column2: Abakashana babili nabasekelela,umo naikata nomunankwe pakubeya.
column3: panchende beminine, kunuma yabo kuli akamuti eko bapangile ubusaka saana.
column4: ee boi,elo aka akamuti kaseka ukuba mu ng'anda munshita ya cikishimishi nangula christmas
column5: namona echo basekele busakabusaka abakashana,nicho ninshita yesu afyalikwemo,kanshi nacibapela insansa saana.
column6: elo boi abakashana aba balemoneka kwati bafyalwa mu ng'anda imo.

column2: umukashana naikala mwishitima  alebelenga nakatabo aleumfwa ne nyimbo.
column3: umukashana alemoneka uwaicefya saana, limbi echo ekalile na eka mwisitima.
column4: awe boi,bushe ukwikala weka ninshi waicefya, limbi isitima akwelelemo talyaiswilefye .
column5: nangu taliswile boi kuti wayaikala apali abanobe, ichibemba chitila twende babili temwenso.
column6: walanda ichishinka,limbi ichacilenga ati ekale eka nicho acilafwaisha ukubelenga akatabo.

column2: imbwa na Ing'ombe fili mwibala,imbwa ilebutuka lelo ing'ombe naiminina.
column3: boi ibala lilemoneka kwati likulu saana pantu namona balibikako ilinga mukufwaya ukucingilila inama shabo.
column4: Nomba naumona imbwa ati ilebutuka? kuti chaba ati ilefwaya ukupepeka ing'ombe nangu iletina ing'ombe?
column5: ifwilefye iletina ing'ombe, pantu kwena mukufimonafye imbwa teingapepeka ing'ombe.
column6: nangu limbi naimona cimo kuntanshi icho ilepepeka, walishibafye imbwa shalitemwa utwakupepeka pepeka.

column2: imbwa iyafita ileyangala pa chani, naisuma naka bola kukanwa elo ilefulamuka
column3: amenso ya iine imbwa yalelolesha kumulu kwati pali efyo imwene.
column4: ee boi ifwile ilelolesha umwine waka bola isumine kukanwa.
column5: naingililwa nomwenso pantu naiposha kale akamupila.
column6: imbwa shalitemwisha ukwangala maka maka ngapali icho shilebika mukanwa.

column2: imbwa ili pakacuulu ilefwaya ukulya akachani akaleselela mumulu.
column3: kunuma ya mbwa ine iyi kuli nolunkoto,nshishibe icho imbwa yatombokela umusango uyu pakachani eko inga senda napanshifye.
column4: boi imbwa te chonse ichani shilya,shilasala, limbi kalyakene akachani kalikumulu eko ingalyako.
column5: awe nayasamuna kukanwa imbwa ine ii, ameno nayo yalemonekafye ayatwa.
column6: ifwile yali nensala saana, eifi ichibemba cilanda ati inkalamo ngayabulilwa ilya nechani.

column2: shitata nafwala amagalashi mumenso naceneka nokuceneka.
column3: uyuwine umwaume alemoneka kwati alimwibumba lyabantu, mumabotolo afwele mulemoneka abantu abengi.
column4: ee boi,nokuseka asekele chipalile kwati aleseka nomukashana uyo alemoneka mumagalashi yakwe.
column5: Awe umwaume wine uyu alacheneka,chipalile kwati umukashana alimusekesha saana mumimonekele.
column6: nomba boi umulumendo ulya kunuma yamukashana ali kwati aletamba ifyo alecita,abantu balishupa kuti waumfwafye ulubuli lwabuka.

column2: Abana babili baleyangala,bonse babili balumendo.umo naikaka icipepala kumolu umo nafwala nakali koti munuma.
column3: akamwana akakulupo kalefwaya ukulanda fimo,akamwaice kena kaleyangalafye nefyakako.
column4: abaice ifyakwangala fyalifula,ifi akakile kukulu ena alefipanga kwati naifuna elo aikakapo pacilonda.
column5: bwafya saana,umwaice wakwe nawena tamuposeleko namano, alifye nefyakwe aleyangasha ikoti.
column6: cilemoneka kwati ukwangalila pamo nabafilwa,eico cilamuntu aciba nefyo alefwaya ukucita.

column2: ibumba lyabantu abakote, abalumendo nabakashani.elo umulumendo umo ali kuntashi.
column3: cilemoneka kwati bali mukutampa ukutamba fimo pa citunshi tunshi,pantu umulumendo alebika bwino projector.
column4: elo abantu bambi nabekala bambi nabeminina,nabayakanya namutumabumba utunono emo baleshimikila amalyashi.
column5: elo ukulongana kwabantu aba boi kulemoneka kwati kwaku chalici,pantu bali abasankana.
column6: cishinka icho boi,ku church ekuncende imo eko abantu abapusana pusana bakumanina.

column2: Abalumendo babili nomukashana umo, nabafwala na insapato shimoshine.
column3: nomba boi ninshi bengafwalila insapato shimoshine kwati nakalimo nibampundu?
column4: balemoneka kwati nibamunyina bonse,naumona akalumendo ifyo kalelolesha abakalamba?
column5: nimbona boi,imiloleseshe nayo kwati pali uwakeba ifibi, ukulolekesha kwaifi kulatinya,umuntu kuti akupupukila.

column2: Ba nyina , ba wishi nomwana baleenda mumbali ya cimana nabatangisha nomwana
column3: icimana cilemoneka icikulu saana bushe aba bafyashi tabalemona ati umwana kuti aponenamo fyaleta ubwafya?
column4: awe nifyofine, cikulu icimana ici icakweba ati ngaponenamo kuti bafilwa napakutampila ukumufwaya
column5: caliba icikankala saana abafyashi ukulolekesha pabana,pantu ngatabalelolekesha pa bana ngabali kuncende ngeshi kuti caleta ubwafya ubukalamba saana.
column6: Ee nifyo elo cipalile kwati umwana nasansamuka pakumutwala ku menshi, alemonekafye uwansansa

column2: akamukashana kali pa mumana kalengala kunuma yakako kuleisa na mabimbi
column3: Abaice tabakwata nomwenso pantu amabimbi ngayakufikila kuti yaleta ubwafya ubukulu saana.
column4: aka akamukashana kafwile kalishiba ukowa, kalemoneka akasalapuka pa menso
column5: awe kwena kalisalapuka,kaleimya notumolu kwati kaleshana.
column6: aka akamwana takali nakakutina iyo limbi pali abafyashi mupepi, balekatamba nokukacingilila

column2: ba namayo baili nabakumbatana, shikulu bantu muli motoka yakashika alebatamba
column3: bushe shikulubantu kuti aba mulume waumo pali aba bakashana nangula ninamutekenyafye?
column4: cilepala kwati emwine wa motoka pantu motoka ilemoneka kwati teyakukwelamo uuli yonse
column5: ifyo walanda finshinka, elyo kuncende iine kuli ukwayaka ubusaka saana,amalaiti yali mpanga yonse.
column6: kulifye imyotoka sha cindama, cilepala kwati iyi incende kisangwafye abakankala, balya abantu abakwata indalama

column2: Imbwa shitatu shileangala shibili shiloseshe kumo elo imo iloseshe kumbi
column3: shilemoneka kwati shili pebala nomwine washiko,elyo nimbona nakabwa akanono kukulu kwailya imbwa yabutulukila.
column4: ninshi kalya akabwa akanono kuti kaba kana ka mbwa imo pali ishi shitatu
column5: ee walungika,maka maka ilyaine imbwa iikulu kapalamene nayena.
column6: Eya, elo kuntashi kuli umuntu na ci mashini chipalile kwati ishi imbwa shatekwa pe bala.

column2: umulumendo mukasote ali pa mbali ye tenti alepekanya ifyakulya cipalile ali nensala
column3: incende iliko umulemendo ilemoneka iyamucanga mucanga elyo kunuma yakwe kuli akalupili akanono.
column4: incende shaifi kwakuya nauipekanya, eico kanshi umulumendo nasenda necibotolo ca menshi kuti wafwa necilaka
column5: ee walungika,nimbona napanga naka li tent bwino bwino cipalile alelala ukukwine uyu mulumendo.
column6: Nisnhi uyu umuntu cipalile kwati Ali pabulendo ubutali anakilafye panshila elo atila katusheko.

column2: ibumba lya bantu mu bwato apo apali shitata umo  uulepelekesha umwana kuli shitata uuli ku mbali ya bwato
column3: Abantu abengi nabekala mubwato nabekala,balemoneka kwati balile kumo nomba babwela.
column4: abantu balelokesha balentamba eko shitata alepelekesha akamwana
column5: nomba ababene bantu ninshi balelolekesha umusango uyu kwati bamona icintu icikalamba saana?
column6: ala bwafya kuti waipusha webele bushe aba bantu nabafika nangula elo baleya

column2: Abantu bane nabekala pa mbali ya mumana mu chungulo baletamba eko akasuba kalewa
column3: Abantu aba nabekala ubusaka saana,nakumbwa pantu cilomfwika bwino saana ukutamba ifyo lesa apanga umwine.
column4: chishinka, ndesubila nabo baleelenganya nokuipisha eko akasuba kaleya
column5: nomba ababene bantu tabakweteko nomwenso ati paleya palefita?
column6: umwenso cilemoneka tabakwete pantu bali abengi, elo limbi kuti belefye mukwishako nokuposako akashita
